issue.title: [Archery][Benchmark] Output properly formatted jsonlines from benchmark diff cli command
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5325](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5325). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
{archery benchmark diff --output=diff.jsonl} writes objects without newline separator.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5325?focusedCommentId=16844881) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4274
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4274>
